description: Designed for comfort and unconstrained movement, these multifunctional hiking pants are made of 95% nylon (65% recycled)/5% spandex with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish and 40+ UPF sun protection. Inseam is 32 in; also available in 30 in inseam.
name: Patagonia Quandary Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: 4.2-oz 95% nylon (65% recycled), 5% spandex with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish and 40+ UPF sun protection
